name: Ben VS Anime
description:
Take control of Ben as he tries to fight the power of anime!

Hit anime transformed objects that are attacking into the personification of anime's power in order to take them down. Be careful though because if the enemies get to you, you might end up liking anime too! 

Tools
  • Unity
    • iTween
    • Cinemachine
  • FMOD
  • Photoshop
  • After Effects
  • Premier
Team

  • Jacob Dinis
